_header: Herod thou wicked foe whereof is thy dreading
_description: William Herebert, a hymn based on ‘Hostis Herodes impie’ — fourteen lines

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Herodes þou wykked fo whar of ys tþy dredingeAnd why art þou so sore a gast of cristes tocominge…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Wele Louerd boe myd þe þat shewedest þe todayWyth þe uader and þe holy gost wythouten endeday
